body: Mammals        The American Beaver keeps green trees under water to 'refrigerate' them until future feedings. National Park Service       Here is a forest ready to be explored. Full of many wonderful plants and animals, there is a nature encounter awaiting at every turn.  Among the mammals living at Prince William Forest Park are:         American Beaver         Black Bear         White Tail Deer      Coyote
title: Prince William Forest Park: Mammals
